title: The owner shall establish effective systems for collection, segregation, composting and / or reuse of different types of solid waste collected during the construction and operational phase of the development
clause_text: The owner shall establish effective systems for collection, segregation, composting and / or reuse of different types of solid waste collected during the construction and operational phase of the development.
section: The norms for buildings shall be as follows -
